jhelp.android.api

Class ThreadTask<PARAMETER>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • jhelp.android.api.ThreadTask<PARAMETER>
  • Type Parameters:
    PARAMETER - Parameter type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public abstract class ThreadTask<PARAMETER>
extends java.lang.Thread
    Task executed in separate thread, that can be paused.
    For pause system work, find the "loop" inside the operation of the task to do, and only put the inside loop.For example fir task is something like : then the usage can be :
    To start a task, call start(), to terminate properly call terminateTask()
    Author:
    JHelp

      • doALoopOfTask

        protected abstract void doALoopOfTask(PARAMETER parameter)
        Call at each loop of the task.
        A pause can only append on a start of a loop (not in the middle of one)
        Parameters:
        parameter - Task parameter
